data.title: Avril Lavigne's kids: Does the Canadian rock artist have any children?
data.meta_description: Who are Avril Lavigne’s kids? Check out this article for details about her family, music career and controversial relationships with high-profile guys.
data.text:
Pop-punk princess Avril Lavigne has always kept fans engaged with her music and complicated romantic life. She has been in several high-profile relationships, including marriages to Deryck Whilbey and Chad Kroeger. So, did she have any children from her past relationships? If yes, who are Avril Lavigne's kids?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Avril Lavigne's profile summary

Who is Avril Lavigne?

Avril Lavigne's dating history

Did Avril Lavigne have a baby?

Is Avril Lavigne currently in a relationship?

FAQs about Avril Lavigne

Final word on Avril Lavigne's kids

For celebrities like Avril Lavigne, who have been in the spotlight since their teenage years, it's no surprise when fans are so invested in their personal lives. With her long career and controversial relationships, Lavigne's fans are curious to know whether she has any kids.

Avril Lavigne's profile summary

Full nameAvril Ramona LavigneGenderFemale Date of birthSeptember 27, 1984Age40 years old (as of 2024)Zodiac signLibraPlace of birthBelleville, OntarioCurrent residenceMalibu, CarliforniaNationalityCanadian, AmericanEthnicityFrench-CanadianReligionChristianitySexual orientationStraightRelationship status SingleEx-spouses2FatherJean Claude LavigneMotherJudith-Rosanne LoshawSiblingsMatthew, MichelleProfessionCanadian singer-songwriter

Who is Avril Lavigne?

Avril Ramona Lavigne was born in Belleville, Ontario on September 27, 1984 to Jean Claude Lavigne and Judith-Rosanne Loshaw. She is a Canadian singer-songwriter dubbed pop-punk music princess. She has two siblings, Matthew and Michelle, who she claims used to tease her when she sang.

At 16, Avril signed two contracts with Arista Records. Her debut album, Let Go (2002), became the 21st-century best-selling album by a Canadian artist. Her second album, Under My Skin (2004), became her first album to top the Billboard 200 chart in the USA, selling 10 million copies globally.

Avril Lavigne went on to produce several albums, including The Best Thing (2007), Goodbye Lullaby (2011), Avril Lavigne (2013), Head Above Water (2019) and Love Sux (2022). They were all commercial successes and certified gold in Canada, the USA and other countries.

Avril Lavigne's dating history

Lavigne's first marriage was to fellow Canadian musician Deryck Whibley, the lead vocalist of the punk rock band Sum 41. They started dating when Lavigne was 17 and married on July 15, 2006, when she was just 21. However, in 2009, Avril filed for a divorce, and it was finalised in 2010.

In February 2010, she began dating The Hills alum Brody Jenner, but they broke up in January 2012.

In July 2012, Lavigne began dating Nickelback’s band frontman Chad Kroeger. They co-wrote and co-produced her fifth studio album and got engaged in August 2012. They tied the knot in July 2013 in the south of France.

Are Avril Lavigne and Chad Kroeger still married? Sadly, the marriage didn't last. In September 2015, Avril Lavigne announced their separation on Instagram, and they later divorced.

Lavigne then dated billionaire Philip Sarofim (2018-2019) and musician Pete Jonas (2020).

Lavigne was recently engaged to musician Mod Sun (real name Derek Ryan Smith). They began dating in March 2021 after collaborating on her album Love Sux. They engaged in Paris in April 2022, and Lavigne announced it on social media. However, they called off the engagement in February 2023.

Did Avril Lavigne have a baby?

Who is the father of Avril Lavigne's children? Despite being married twice and having flings with several high-profile guys, Avril Lavigne has never had any children. There were rumours about potential pregnancies in the past, but none were ever confirmed.

Is Avril Lavigne currently in a relationship?

Is Avril Lavigne married? Avril Lavigne is not in a relationship or marriage. However, in February 2023, Lavigne was spotted having dinner with rapper Tyga, sparking rumours of a new romance. At the time, a source confirmed that the pair were just friends. According to Entertainment Tonight, the pair dated for a few months before calling it quits.

In the weeks that followed, they reconnected and were spotted in Paris. In March 2023, Lavigne and Tyga confirmed their relationship after being seen kissing at a Paris Fashion Week party. In June 2023, they again called it quits but briefly rekindled the relationship in July 2023 before finally splitting in October 2023.

FAQs about Avril Lavigne

Did Avril Lavigne get married? Avril Lavigne has had a complicated love life over the years – she has been married and divorced twice. But she shared that she’s still open to romance.

Is Avril Lavigne a middle child? Yes, Lavigne is the middle child of Jean Claude Lavigne and Judith-Rosanne. She has an older brother, Matthew and a younger sister, Melissa.

Is Avril Lavigne spiritual? Lavigne was brought up as a Catholic. Recently, she shared that even though she doesn't attend church often, she has a personal relationship with God.

Is Avril Lavigne related to Adam Levine? Avril Lavigne and Adam Levine aren't related in any way. In addition, it's worth noting that while their last names are pronounced the same way, the spellings are different.

Who was the first husband of Avril? Lavigne’s first husband was Deryck Whibley (2006-2009). The two met when Avril was 17, started dating when she was 19 and married when she was 21.

How old was Avril Lavigne when she got famous? Lavigne released Let Go in 2002 while aged 17. It made her the youngest female soloist to have a number-one album in Australia, Canada and the United Kingdom.

Are Tyga and Avril Lavigne engaged? No, pop-punk princess Avril Lavigne and rapper Tyga are “totally done” with each other.

Final word on Avril Lavigne's kids

Who are Avril Lavigne's kids? Avril Lavigne does not have any children from her past marriages or relationships. While there may have been rumours about potential pregnancies in the past, none were indeed true.
